name: Bug-Sieged
description:
Controls:

99% mouse control.  The R key will rotate wall orientation. If you are stuck in the deletion action "delete" the main base, it will cancel the deletion.

Lore:

Battle against ferocious bugs while ruling over a small kingdom. In this kingdom lives people the size of ants. It is up to you to build this kingdom up and defend it against bugs the best you can. At day you build and flourish. At night you battle bugs as they are attracted to the light irradiating from your kingdom. Good luck! 

Made in 3 days by Yours truly.
